node.title: 01. The End-Time Prophetic Catalyst
node.description: As believes in the soon return of Jesus, Seventh-day Adventists have long looked at prophecy to best understand what signs will precede the coming of Jesus. In this presentation, we will look at the prophetic catalyst that will usher in the point of no return for the final events of Earth's history. It is the National Sunday Law that will be the trigger. This presentation forms the foundation for the topics that come afterward as we seek to understand end-time prophecy and to be ready for Christ's soon return.
